# The `BinaryByteStream` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An implementation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystream">BinaryStream</a> which holds its entire data set in a single contiguous buffer. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

An implementation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystream">BinaryStream</a> which holds its entire data set in a single contiguous buffer.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarybytestream">BinaryByteStream</a> guarantees that no read operation will ever incur a copy. Note that <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarybytestream">BinaryByteStream</a> does not own the underlying buffer.

Definition at line 30 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/binarybytestream-h">BinaryByteStream.h</a>.
